trans-unit.source: Indicates that the supplier is obsolete and has been marked for deletion at the company code, purchasing organization, or central level.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates that the supplier is obsolete and has been marked for deletion at the company code, purchasing organization, or central level.

target.mrk: 表示供應商作廢，且已在公司代碼、採購組織或中央層次標加註刪除標記。

trans-unit.source: If you select <uicontrol>Yes</uicontrol>, then the displayed list will only include obsolete suppliers marked for deletion at any level. If you select <uicontrol>No</uicontrol>, then the displayed list will only include current suppliers. Leave the dropdown list blank to display a list of all suppliers, regardless of status.

seg-source.mrk: If you select <uicontrol>Yes</uicontrol>, then the displayed list will only include obsolete suppliers marked for deletion at any level.
If you select <uicontrol>No</uicontrol>, then the displayed list will only include current suppliers.
Leave the dropdown list blank to display a list of all suppliers, regardless of status.

target.mrk: 如果您選取 <uicontrol>[是]</uicontrol>，清單僅會顯示在任何層次標記為待刪除的已作廢供應商。
如果您選取 <uicontrol>[否]</uicontrol>，清單僅會顯示目前的供應商。
無論狀態為何，請勿勾選下拉式請單，以便顯示清單中的所有供應商。
